manpage.title: rewind

description.para: Resets a file pointer to the beginning of file.

remarks.para: The rewind function resets the file pointer associated with stream to the beginning of file. It is similar to (void) fseek(stream, 0L, SEEK_SET), but it doesn't return any value that indicates whether the pointer succeeds to be moved and it will clear the error sign and the end-of-file sign.

manpage.result: The values written are: 1 and -37 The values read are: 1 and -37
